Cam’ron’s Emojis Are Out And Ready To Be Used In All Of Your Conversations

posted by Andres Tardio on December 9, 2014 in Uncategorized
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of

Cam’ron gave us a preview of his emojis in October, but now, they have been released. The emojis, which are out via Hi-Art, are more extensive than the original small batch we got a couple of months ago. Now, you can add Cam to your conversations with an array of new images. Check the gallery for the updated emojis and then check out Lil B’s emojis, too. Guess this is what Cam meant when he said traditional emojis were “done.”

Tags:  cam'ron, Emojis
